value.name: Report: Officer Shot Deon Kay in Self-Defense But Chance to De-Escalate Was ‘Squandered'
value.description: A new report finds that although the officer shooting and killing of 18-year-old Deon Kay was justified, citing self defense, it also says there were a series of missed opportunities before that moment that possibly could have led to a different outcome.

value.name: MPD Officers’ Poor Tactics Contributed to Deon Kay’s Death
value.description: An auditor's report of MPD's internal investigation identifies errors that contributed to the killing of 18-year-old Deon Kay.

value.name: Audit: Shooting death of Deon Kay justified but cops 'acted recklessly and without a plan'
value.description: Last summer, a D. C. police officer shot and killed 18-year-old Deon Kay in Southeast D. C. A new audit of that shooting says it was justified, but also says the officers involved "acted recklessly and without a plan.
